a:authorAction.a:name: REZ
a:authorAction.a:description: Send selected text to all recensions but the current one.

a:arguments.a:argument: <choice xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><seg source="${xpath_eval(string-join(//sourceDesc//listWit[@xml:id and (let $recension := @xml:id, $current := tokenize(//appInfo/application[@ident eq 'oxmre']/ptr[@subtype eq 'current']/@target) return some $c in $current satisfies $c ne concat('#', $recension))]/@xml:id ! concat('#', .), ' '))}"/><seg source="${xpath_eval(//appInfo/application[@ident eq 'oxmre']/ptr[@subtype eq 'current']/@target)}">${caret}</seg></choice>
